entry.title: Monday: A few clouds. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
